short_description: evesham autograss is a race tracks & racing supplier based in stratford-upon-avon, united kingdom.
long_description: based at our home track, the john wilkin raceway at dodwells stratford-upon-avon. we have been established for over 50 years. you don't need a race car to be a member. we have non race members that love to get involved in the running of the club and race meeting. racing from class 1 - 10 from 1000cc standard engines to 2070cc and twin bike engines,.

generated_description: evesham autograss is a motor racing club based at the john wilkin raceway in stratford-upon-avon, england. established for over 50 years, the club is part of the m.a.p league and hosts various national autograss events. the club features 11 nasa classes, ranging from standard 1000cc minis to specially designed single-seater cars with powerful engines. races typically involve up to eight cars starting on a straight line grid and cover 4-10 laps, with major meetings consisting of over 200 races. the club welcomes both race car drivers and non-race members, fostering a friendly and social atmosphere among participants.
